Text: NAM Board of Directors MeetingOctober To NAM Directors DirectorNominees Wanted you to know that everything is on track for the NAM Fall Board Meeting at the Monarch Hotel in Washington DC October We have confirmations from our speakers Secretary of State Powell Secretary of Treasury ONeill Secretary of Commerce Evans EPA Administrator Whitman and Senator Kennedy DMA We continue to work with the White House hoping for an address by the President and that appears quite likely If so there is also a high probability that we will go to The White House complex for that address Unfortunately because of space limitations only NAM Directors and their spouses will be included in that group With the threat of recession on everyones mind we will focus much of our attention on the economy as well as on security issues and life after Sept during our plenary and regional breakout sessions We look forward to your active participation in these discussions about how to achieve economic recovery and improve homeland security In addition to the security that is automatic with Administration officials when they appear before a group we have secured the assistance of a professional firm to assure that our directors and guests feel safe and secure during our meeting We are returning to normalcy within the city as far as air and rail travel are concerned A few delays can be expected as you enter and exit the security gates But I encourage you to feel confident that you will enjoy your visit to Washington DC and that we will have a great meeting I look forward to seeing you soon
